Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.entities

Class GlobalRect

java.lang.Object
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.entities.GlobalRect
public class GlobalRect extends Object
Represents an axis-aligned rectangle using floating point coordinates. Useful when the right and bottom side coordinates of a rectangle are needed instead of its width and height.

  • Field Summary
